song_name: The Lord Loves the One (That Loves the Lord)
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The Lord Loves the One (That Loves the Lord) is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
